name: The battle axe, 'White Crescent' (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It does magical damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
This axe is more effective against the undead.
